author: KEN MORITSUGU and ZEKE MILLER Associated Press
title: Nations debate easing virus restrictions as economies falter
description: Governments around the world are wrestling with when and how to lift economically painful virus-control measures as unemployment rises and rent payments come due
content:
BEIJING -- 
Governments around the world are wrestling with when and how to lift economically painful virus-control measures as unemployment rises and rent payments come due.
